Sentencas: Thermal management of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack essentially involves control of the temperature within a specific range in order to maintain good performance of the stack.
Titulo: Predictive control of solid oxide fuel cell based on an improved Takagi-Sugeno fuzzy model

Sentencas: In this paper, a nonlinear temperature predictive control algorithm based on an improved Takagi-Sugeon (T-S) fuzzy model is presented.
Titulo: Predictive control of solid oxide fuel cell based on an improved Takagi-Sugeno fuzzy model

Sentencas: The improved T-S fuzzy model can be identified by the training data and becomes a predictive model.
Titulo: Predictive control of solid oxide fuel cell based on an improved Takagi-Sugeno fuzzy model

Sentencas: The branch-and-bound method and the greedy algorithm are employed to set a discrete optimization and an initial upper boundary, respectively.
Titulo: Predictive control of solid oxide fuel cell based on an improved Takagi-Sugeno fuzzy model

Sentencas: Simulation results show the advantages of the model predictive control (MPC) based on the identified and improved T-S fuzzy model for an SOFC stack.
Titulo: Predictive control of solid oxide fuel cell based on an improved Takagi-Sugeno fuzzy model
